comment: Great product. Really helpful for my daily exercises

comment: The heart monitor of the watch is spot on. Very accurate technology.Give it a Try and You will know

comment: I really love the looks and the aesthetics of Bolos tot5. I bought another one for my son too. He liked it

comment: Love the watch.It has customizable belts too. Good for casual looks and sports

comment: I liked the previous version. This version not so much. The watch is not waterproof enough.
